summary: Autonomous car fails to detect pedestrians in low light conditions
description: Improve the night vision model with IR-enhanced training data and increase sensor fusion accuracy.
Implement active cooling during charge cycles and optimize thermal regulation algorithms.

summary: Self-driving vehicle struggles with lane detection in heavy rain
description: Enhance sensor fusion by combining LiDAR, radar, and thermal cameras to compensate for poor vision conditions.

summary: Reduced sensor performance in heavy rain leading to incorrect obstacle detection
description: Enhance sensor fusion techniques by prioritizing radar data over vision-based sensors in adverse weather conditions and implement advanced filtering algorithms to remove rain-induced noise in LiDAR readings.

summary: Unexpected braking due to false positive obstacle detection
description: Refine object classification models to reduce misclassification of shadows and minor road debris as obstacles.

summary: Navigation system provides inaccurate route suggestions in urban areas
description: Integrate real-time traffic and road condition updates from multiple sources to improve route optimization.

summary: Electric vehicle range significantly decreases in cold weather
description: Implement preconditioning systems for battery thermal management and optimize regenerative braking in cold environments.

summary: Delayed response in autonomous emergency braking
description: Improve response times by optimizing decision algorithms and reducing sensor processing latency.
